boat.name: Jan Mayen
boat.full_description:
'Jan Mayen' is a 29' motorsailor built from iroko on oak frames with pitch-pine bottom boards. She is a strong boat. In previous ownerships she has cruised as far north as Spitzbergen. 

In 2014 - 15 'Jan Mayen' underwent a major refurbishment to her interior with a new beta 43 engine, new electrics, calorifier, WC, refrigerator and Taylor's diesel heater. A new furling jib was also added. Her superstructure has been stripped back to bare wood and revarnished as have the spars. A new teak cockpit sole was added with a hatch to access tender storage below.

Based in the Solent, she has cruised the South Coast to Falmouth, the Channel Islands and North Brittany.
boat.short_description: Built at Whisstocks Boatyard, Woodbridge, Suffolk in 1964, 'Jan Mayen' is a 29' motorsailor now berthed in the Solent.
